strings:
<voice_0x01000CC8><se_def>King Pavan: Never again will I forget the things Sasha
told me.

<voice_0x01000CC9><se_def>King Pavan: It felt like a dream, but I believe in what I saw.
Thank you. Thank you so much...

<voice_0x01000CCA><se_def>King Pavan: Thanks to you and Emma, I've finally woken
up from an unbearable nightmare.
Now I can be a proper king to my people again.

<voice_0x01000CCB><se_def>King Pavan: ...I cannot thank you enough.
If there is ever anything I can do for you,
please do not hesitate to ask.
<voice_0x01000CCC><se_def>King Pavan: I swear I will do anything in my power to repay you. Anything at all I can do to help.

<voice_0x01000CCD><se_def>King Pavan: Farewell, my friends. May fortune ride with
you on your continuing journey.
I hope we will meet again soon.
